games.title: Police Chase Simulator
games.description:
Dive into the world of police chases, destruction, and crazy races!
Choose from over 15 vehicles, including sedans, SUVs, trucks, and special cars.

üó∫Ô∏è Maps:
‚Ä¢ üåÜ City with wide streets and green suburbs.
‚Ä¢ üåï Moon with low gravity and a cosmic backdrop.
‚Ä¢ üèûÔ∏è Countryside with hills, jumpable rocks, and a destruction zone.
‚Ä¢ üõ†Ô∏è Test area with ramps, presses, and numerous props for experimentation.

üé® Tuning:
‚Ä¢ Full control over your car's appearance ‚Äî paint every detail.
‚Ä¢ Adjust wheels: change camber, height, and size!

‚öôÔ∏è Destruction Physics:
‚Ä¢ Cars crumple, doors and wheels fall off, windows shatter!
‚Ä¢ Environment partially destructible, creating explosions and chaos.

‚è≥ Time Control:
‚Ä¢ Enjoy time-slowing effects for epic moments with a single click.

üèÅ Game Modes:
‚Ä¢ Choose between racing or sandbox for free driving.
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
TAB - pause menu (or Escape)

WASD - driving.
Spacebar - handbrake.
Shift - nitro.
C - change camera.
R - reset car.
K - restore car.
B - slow down time.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.

games.title: Dark City. Multiplayer
games.description:
Dark City. Multiplayer is an online open-world horror game where players are divided into two factions: police and bandits, fighting for control over an abandoned city consumed by darkness.

The world is alive and shared among all players ‚Äî every step could lead to a confrontation with an enemy... or something far worse.

The police try to restore order, protect survivors, and reclaim captured territories.

The bandits aim to establish their rule by taking over zones, setting ambushes, and hiding in the shadows.

Capture areas, hold control, fend off enemy attacks‚Ä¶ and survive the horror slowly awakening in the depths of the city.
games.howToPlayText:
WASD ‚Äì Move
Space ‚Äì Jump
Enter ‚Äì Game Chat
E ‚Äì Inventory

After starting the game, join the bandit or police faction and capture as many districts as possible.
Every 30 seconds, you will receive money for the districts you control.
